infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Allow SmileNow to access camera in order to change your profile picture and share posts.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Allow access to photos to upload photos from your library for profile pics.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Smile Now would like to save photos to your library to share posts from your feed.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: Allow SmileNow to access your contacts so that you can add friends from your contacts list.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow SmileNow to access your camera.

plugins.contactsPermission: Allow SmileNow to access your contacts.
